meanings.definition: The quality or state of being rude or impolite.
meanings.sent1: Her constant rudenesses towards her classmates made them feel sad.
meanings.sent2: I was shocked by the rudenesses of the customer at the store.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show exaggerated the rudenesses of the characters for laughs.
meanings.sent4: The rudenesses of the storm left a trail of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The teacher addressed the student's rudenesses in front of the whole class.

meanings.definition: Acts or words that are disrespectful or discourteous.
meanings.sent1: The rudenesses of his comments hurt her feelings deeply.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't tolerate the rudenesses of her co-worker any longer.
meanings.sent3: The movie portrayed the aliens' rudenesses towards humans in a funny way.
meanings.sent4: The rudenesses of the traffic made the daily commute unbearable.
meanings.sent5: His rudenesses towards the elderly lady were completely uncalled for.
